mapper.select: SELECT B.nick AS userNick , A.title , A.ctnt , A.regdt , A.iboard FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser;

SELECT A.iboard , A.title , A.ctnt , B.nick AS userNick , A.regdt , A.provider FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.provider = #{param.provider}
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scri.keyword},'%')
AND A.ctnt LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scri.keyword},'%')
AND B.nick LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scri.keyword},'%')
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%'+#{scri.keyword}+'%') OR A.ctnt LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scri.keyword},'%')
ORDER BY A.iboard DESC LIMIT #{scri.pageStart} , #{scri.perPageNum};
SELECT A.iboard , A.title , A.ctnt , A.provider , B.nick AS userNick , B.regdt , B.iuser FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard}
SELECT iboardimg , iboard , img FROM t_board_img WHERE iboard = #{iboard}
